Definition.name: dimm

Documentation.content: Matrix multiply when either A or B is a diagonal and is passed as a vector. alpha*op(A) op(B) + beta*C where op() is transpose
Documentation.firstline: Matrix multiply when either A or B is a diagonal and is passed as a vector

param.name: transposeA
param.desc: true when transpose of A is used

param.name: transposeB
param.desc: true when transpose of B is used

param.name: diagonalA
param.desc: true when A is the diagonal matrix

param.name: diagonalB
param.desc: true when B is the diagonal matrix

param.name: k
param.desc: number of columns/rows for the multiplier/multiplicand

Signature.name: dimm
Signature.param: (BOOLEAN transposeA, BOOLEAN transposeB, BOOLEAN diagonalA, BOOLEAN diagonalB, Types.dimension_t m, Types.dimension_t n, Types.dimension_t k, Types.value_t alpha, Types.matrix_t A, Types.matrix_t B, Types.value_t beta=0.0, Types.matrix_t C=[])

Definition.Signature: Types.matrix_t dimm(BOOLEAN transposeA, BOOLEAN transposeB, BOOLEAN diagonalA, BOOLEAN diagonalB, Types.dimension_t m, Types.dimension_t n, Types.dimension_t k, Types.value_t alpha, Types.matrix_t A, Types.matrix_t B, Types.value_t beta=0.0, Types.matrix_t C=[])

Documentation.content: Matrix multiply when either A or B is a diagonal and is passed as a vector. alpha*op(A) op(B) + beta*C where op() is transpose

param.name: transposeA
param.desc: true when transpose of A is used

param.name: transposeB
param.desc: true when transpose of B is used

param.name: diagonalA
param.desc: true when A is the diagonal matrix

param.desc: true when B is the diagonal matrix

param.name: k
param.desc: number of columns/rows for the multiplier/multiplicand
